f13290.value: e in its Paper Mills, companies involved in sale of paper and in pulp producing companies, procurement office and a company producing food packaging. Our Paper Mills are located in Poland and in Sweden. Pulp Mills are located in Sweden. As at 31 December 2020, the Group had 14 Sales Offices ensuring access to all European markets, including Central and Eastern Europe

f13304.value:
The principal business of the Arctic Paper Group is the production of paper and pulp. 
				The Group’s additional business, subordinate to paper and pulp production, covers:
				—generation of electricity,
				—transmission of electricity,
				—electricity distribution,
				—heat production,
				—heat distribution,
				—logistics services,
				—paper distribution.
